package For;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class for1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
 Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in); 
 System.out.println("tell me the time please");
		int a =input.nextInt();
 switch (a)
 { case 8, 9, 10, 11: System.out.println("GMorning"); break;
 case 12: System.out.println("it is noon"); break;
 case 13, 14, 15, 16: System.out.println("GAfternoon"); break;
  default: System.out.println("GNight");}
 }
 }
